sub_topic: Prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is not commutative with respect to intersection.
message_1: Let A={1,2} and B={2,3}. Find (A∩B) x (B∩A) and (B∩A) x (A∩B), then compare the two results to prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is not commutative with respect to intersection.
